message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $60, you take $40.  It's in your best interest to settle quickly!
I think we can do better than that. Considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more. Let's settle on 55-45.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money by arguing! I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now before we both lose out.
